description: The Butterfly Bush (Buddleja davidii) is an amazing plant that is sure to make any garden come alive with beauty and fragrance. It produces colorful blossoms in shades of purple and pink that attract many species of butterflies. Its Pyrkeep purple emperor variety is an even more attractive variety with deep purple panicles and a strong sweet fragrance. It is an especially good choice for gardeners looking for a colorful and easy-to-care-for plant as its blooms last all season long with very little maintenance. It thrives in exterior gardens or even indoors in containers, adding a splash of purple to any environment. It's truly an enchanting addition to your home.
